ModMetaData.author: DeeMainiac
ModMetaData.name: Secure Contain Rimworld
ModMetaData.description:
Adds objects and containment procedures from the SCP Foundation project. Includes creatures, weapons, apparel, artifacts, and factions.
<size=24>Current SCPs</size>
SCP-113, SCP-127, SCP-250, SCP-262, SCP-529, SCP-572, SCP-3033 (1 and 2), SCP-3118, SCP-3199, SCP-5185
<size=24>Compatibility</size>
I recommend having Ideology, but it's optional.
no compatibility/incompatibility information yet. Although I'm pretty sure there's no compatibility with Combat Extended.
<size=24>Credits</size>
Programming + art by DeeMainiac
Content relating to the SCP Foundation, including the SCP Foundation logo, is licensed under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0 and all concepts originate from http://www.scpwiki.com and its authors. That being said, head to the GitHub page to see the full, unadulterated credits.
